responsibilities: Use different object-oriented programming languages to build performant and scalable applications in a cloud-based microservice architecture
Participate in shaping the technical architecture of the product
Own technical solutions for new product requirements
Deliver highly available and scalable services in a production environment
Generate ideas for new initiatives and technologies
Collaborate with business stakeholders, product management, operations, and peer technical teams to focus on delivering impactful products
Mentor other members of the team and help foster a learning environment within the team across multiple offices
Work in the core stack: Java / Kotlin / Microservices / Spring Boot / Kafka/ AWS / PostgreSQL / MongoDB
skills: Expertise with any modern Java frameworks, REST APIs, and SQL and NoSQL databases
Strong sense of accountability and ownership; driving a project from inception to completion
Willingness to roll up your sleeves, collaborate with others and get stuff done
Experience working in a team coding environment, refining designs together, working through code reviews and managing requests
Passionate about broadening your technical skill set, trying out new ideas, and teaching others
Effective communication and technical leadership skills
Desire to grow, learn, and collaborate with a team of engineers
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills listed do not explicitly mention working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The responsibilities focus on building scalable applications using object-oriented programming languages, participating in technical architecture, and delivering services in a production environment. The core stack includes Java, Kotlin, Microservices, Spring Boot, Kafka, AWS, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB, which are typical technologies for backend development and cloud-based applications. The skills emphasize expertise in Java frameworks, REST APIs, SQL and NoSQL databases, accountability, collaboration, and technical leadership. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, or specific technologies related to GenAI or LLMs, such as natural language processing, neural networks, or AI model development.
